department: Communications Research Center - Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
Amarisoft 5G Transmitter

#### Tender Reference Number
cb-10-63365101

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Tender Status Explanation
This tender notice is no longer active, and the tender period has already ended.

### Tender Details

#### Tender Description
The Communication Research Center, part of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada, is requesting submissions for the supply of Amarisoft 5G Transmitter equipment. The tender includes the requirement for technical support and software upgrades.

#### Tender Scope
The tender scope includes:

* 1x Amari Callbox Ultimate package, including i9 processor-based PC, Amari PCIe SDR 100 4x4 cards, test SIM cards, RF combiners, and RF cables.
* 1x Amari NW FR2 hardware package (24~30GHz, 2, B), including 2x2 high and low conversion hops, horn antennas, and FR2 RF cables.

#### Tender Requirements

* Submission of bids must be made by October 26, 2023, at 2:00 pm EST.
* A bid must meet all evaluation criteria, including technical compliance and matching equivalent products.
* The lowest priced responsive bid will be recommended for award.
* Taxes and freight costs will be included in the bid.

#### Tender Attachment
Document annex A equipment list is attached [link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21949/annex-b---npp20231026-english.pdf]

#### Contact Information

* Samantha Amadio: samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 542-2505
* Address: 3701 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, ON, K2H 8S2, Canada

#### Notice Type
Request for Supply Arrangement

#### Procurement Reference
NPP20231026

#### Creation Date
October 12, 2023
